title: God: Fact or Fiction?: Exploring the Relationship Between Scienc
description:
God: Fact or Fiction?: Exploring the Relationship Between Science Religion and the Origin of Life - Brendan Roberts  epub/mobi

Many people believe that science and religion cannot meet let alone do the tango, but Brendan shows very clearly that we can tell God exists through both. Be prepared to encounter such fascinating subjects as:

•the wonder of the universe
•unlocking the chemistry of life
•evolution
•DNA
•Intelligent Design
•archaeology
•evil
 suffering
•the soul
•Sacred Scripture
•truth
•miracles
•and much, much more

This book has the potential to open up to the reader a whole new world from the eyes of science, religion and the origin of life. 

Please seed.  Thanks!
